mapper.insert: insert into `order`(orderTime, venueStateId, userId, comment, price) values (#{orderTime}, #{venueStateId}, #{userId}, #{comment}, #{price})
mapper.select: select o.id, o.orderTime, s.end, s.begin, v.name, v.address, o.price from `order` o left join venue_state s on o.venueStateId = s.id left join venue v on s.venueId = v.id where o.userId = #{id}
select v.id from `order` o left join venue_state s on o.venueStateId = s.id left join venue v on s.venueId = v.id where o.id = #{orderId}

select o.id, o.orderTime, s.end, s.begin, v.name, v.address, o.price from `order` o left join venue_state s on o.venueStateId = s.id left join venue v on s.venueId = v.id where o.userId = #{id} and o.comment = 0

select o.id, o.orderTime, s.end, s.begin, v.name, v.address, o.price, u.name usern, u.username, u.phoneNumber from `order` o left join venue_state s on o.venueStateId = s.id left join user u on u.id = o.userId left join venue v on s.venueId = v.id

select o.id, o.orderTime, s.end, s.begin, v.name, v.address, o.price, u.name usern, u.username, u.phoneNumber from `order` o left join venue_state s on o.venueStateId = s.id left join user u on u.id = o.userId left join venue v on s.venueId = v.id where o.id = #{id}
select COUNT(v.name) from `order` o left join venue_state s on o.venueStateId = s.id left join venue v on s.venueId = v.id where v.id = #{id} and o.orderTime > #{day} and v.valid = 1
